step_data.thought: The 'Orders' section has been navigated to, but the 'Orders' tab is still not selected. Given that the 'Orders' section is already loaded, we should now check if the page contains the transaction history directly. The page currently displays no transaction history, as indicated by the message 'We couldn't find any records.' We will now check if there is a link or button to load or display transactions. If not, we will inform the user that the transaction history might not be available or that there is an issue with the page.
